LANDING.CTA_DESCRIPTION: Discover the latest electronics at MinasPhone and enhance your mobile experience.

DEVICE_UPGRADES.TITLE: Device Upgrades
DEVICE_UPGRADES.DESCRIPTION: Elevate your tech experience with our latest device upgrades for improved performance and features.

SCREEN_REPLACEMENTS.TITLE: Screen Replacements

MONEYGRAM_SERVICES.TITLE: MoneyGram Partner
MONEYGRAM_SERVICES.DESCRIPTION: As an official MoneyGram partner, we offer a reliable and fast international money transfer service to send or receive money worldwide.

RIA_MONEY_TRANSFER.DESCRIPTION: In partnership with Ria, we provide fast and secure solutions for your international transactions, making sending and receiving money easier than ever.

CONTACT_US.TITLE: Contact Us Today
CONTACT_US.DESCRIPTION: Fill out the form below to get in touch with our team. We're here to answer any questions you may have and provide expert advice for all your electronics smartphone needs.
